title: unspecified error patch 7.1
body: someone help me out please i have tried what previous threads have said and its still not working, I've uninstalled twice still the same error I'm at the point where i will sell my pc and not play league anymore please help out and ffs riot fix your crap ive spent alot on cash on my new pc and the game wont load useless. cheers guys .

replies.body: it seems to be a problem with net connections if it drops out it seems to do this error just switched over to the nbn rebooted modem and fine now.

This is a relatively recent issue that we've been seeing lately. Please try the solutions in the following post and let me know if that resolves your issue:

http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/VJeqP4UK-fullscreen-issueout-of-range-issue

replies.poster: s h o o o p i e
replies.body: yeah having the same problem, the one time I actually wanted to play!{{item:2009}}
